name: MUMBLEYPEG: A Thief's Hand
description:
A super classic old timer is now available for Apple TV.
Mumbley peg was an insanely popular schoolyard game in the XX century.
It’s the perfect way to pass the time, the game is very challenging and requires all of your attention and accuracy.
Compete with your friends, it's perfect companion for any party!
Never heard of the mumblety-peg game? Don’t worry. Today you could play it right on your Apple TV!

Key features:
◉ realistic gameplay to get all of emotions from the real game
◉ two game modes: Classic and Zigzag
◉ highscores table

This game takes minutes to learn and a lifetime to master.
